title: Learning Pathways | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Whether you are looking to grow your skills or explore new areas of expertise, our learning pathways provide the flexibility you need to succeed.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Learning pathways offer flexibility and recognition that cater to your unique learning needs and career advancement goals.
Earn recognition through your preferred learning pathway
Whether you are looking to enhance your skills, advance your career, or explore new areas of expertise, our learning pathways provide the flexibility you need to succeed.
Customise your learning journey that is aligned with your goals – and be empowered to earn recognition at a pace that best suits you.
Explore our range of micro-credentials that are designed to equip you with the competencies needed to transition into new or more advanced job roles.

Largely asynchronous, each micro-credential can be taken individually to earn a specialist certificate that demonstrates mastery in an area, or can be stacked towards an SIT degree or higher qualification.
Discover our bite-sized modules that are curated to deepen your skills and knowledge, at your own flexible and progressive pace.
Each module can be taken individually to complement your existing skillsets, or can be stacked towards a specialist certificate or postgraduate qualification at SIT.
Subscribe now and receive our brochure for the latest updates on our courses, events and insights.
By clicking "Subscribe", you agree to our "

" and also agree that SIT (and its service providers and agents) may collect, use, disclose and/or process your personal data to send you information related to the topic(s) of interest you have selected above, which may include information on courses, seminars, events, resources and/or surveys offered by SIT and/or its Overseas University partners.

We look forward to journeying with you on your path of lifelong learning. You can manage your preferences or unsubscribe at any time through the links provided in our communications. To learn more about how SIT protects your personal data, you may refer to SIT's Personal Data Protection Policy

Exciting news! We are introducing new micro-credentials in Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Be among the first to know by registering your interest today!
SIT reserves the right to make changes to published course information, including dates, times, venues, fees and instructors without prior notice.
